segments.text: Good morning , Madam . Is everything OK ? Is there something I can assist you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , yes . I'm not sure how to use this ATM , I usually go to a clerk and use my Bank Book . But today , I thought I'd try something new . I want to take some money out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Welcome to the electronic age ! I can run you through it ; it's what I'm here for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks so much . Right , I've put my card in . What now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just look at the screen here . It'll give you prompts , you see ? Now you need to enter your PIN number , then press ' enter ' to confirm it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then it'll give me my money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not right away , you need to decide what it is you want to do . The next thing is to select the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here we are ' withdrawal ' , so I just press here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , then enter the amount you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , as simple as that ! I shall never wait for a real person again , these machines are wonderful .
segments.speaker: S2
